+++
###############################################################################
# Archetype for activity post. This is more for explaining the data than
# really a template. Because post files index.md will be generated by the
# python script: Comment free and with an alphabetical ordering
# Optinal values are just commented, obligatory values are set with a default
# value.
# Naming convention: Units are used as official abbreviations and
# suffixed with '__'
###############################################################################

# Obligatory value. Initial set with the name of the attached activity file
# but can be changed. Example: "299901231-235959-activity_99999999999"
title = ""

# Single value in Post: Has to be set to "false" when data maintaining has been finished
# Obligatory value.
draft = true

###############################################################################
# Manual data
###############################################################################

# Single value: running, cycling, hiking
# Obligatory value.
category = ""

# Single value: kollegenrunde, pendel, dierundestunde
#               training, wettkampf, family, leistungstest, rolle,
# Obligatory value.
topic = ""

###############################################################################
# Activity based data
###############################################################################

# Attached activity file name like "299901231-235959-activity_99999999999.tcx"
# Obligatory value.
activity = ""

# Activity Sport: in TCX the 'activity sport' like bike 'biking'
# The category will be derived from this value
# Obligatory value.
activity_sport = ""

# Optional value
#ascending__m = 0

# Optional value
#ascent__m = 0

# Optional value. average_speed in km/h, e.g. 18.2
#average_speed__km_per_h = 0.0

# Optional value
#average_heart_rate__bpm = 0

# Obligatory value. Data format of the activity, e.g. tcx, gpx
base = ""

#  Obligatory value. Started date as locale time with UTC offset information.
# E.g. "2020-06-031T10:30:59+02:00" means 10:30:59 at locale time which
# is 2 h before the UTC 08:30:59 time.
# Use the locale in the blog for visualize the activity date to the user.
# The offset is just relevant to track back to
# the original started time in the TCX or GPX file.
date = ""

#  Obligatory value. Started date in UTC, without a timezone offset.
# E.g. "2020-06-031T08:30:59+00:00"
# All data formats (TCX, GPX and HRM) don't have timezone information.
# My TCX and GPX files have the UTC time (with an ending "Z" for zero) and
# the HRM files have the locale date and time.
# Use this field for matching the corresponding data file or for delta
# calculations, but don't show it to the user.
date_utc = ""

# Optional value
#descending__m = 0

# Optional value
#descent__m = 0

# Optional value
#distance__m = 0.0

# Optional value
#maximum_heart_rate__bpm = 0

# Optional value. Pace in mm:ss/km like "03:45"
#pace = "00:00"

# Obligatory value. Activity data
total_time__s = 0.0

# Obligatory value. derived from timestamp like "2999"
year = ""

###############################################################################
# Optinal. Material assotiation
###############################################################################

# Optional. Singel value: Must exist in /devices, e.g. "giant-xtc-team"
#device = ""

# Optional. Singel value: Copied from device, e.g. "mtb"
#sport = ""

# Optional. Singel value: Combined as <devices>/<topics>, e.g. "giant-xtc-team/pendel"
#device_in_topic = ""


###############################################################################
# Optinal. Utensils assotiation
###############################################################################

# Optional. Multiple value: Must exist in /devices, e.g. "tacx-rolle"
#utensils = ""

###############################################################################
# Others
###############################################################################
# Optional. Can be used as Comment
#description = ""
+++
